messages.message: New post about the behind-the-scenes engineering info about GitHub’s doc site, docs.github.com (http://docs.github.com): https://github.blog/2020-07-02-how-we-launched-docs-github-com/
Did they make it so others can reproduce their docs setup? Seems very polished and would love to see if we could take advatnage of it

@Matt I like the docs, too. There is a large team of doc infrastructure engineering behind this effort. I'm still trying to get traction on getting our docs public to improve SEO and increase traffic and thus increase traffic. You can weigh in on https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CD-158
Yeah wasn't sure if they released the framework for others to use
